## Business Impact

**Severity** (for non-technical reference):
- [ ] Critical - Portal unusable or data loss risk
- [ ] High - Major feature broken, affects daily HR operations
- [ ] Medium - Feature partially broken, workaround exists
- [ ] Low - Minor issue, cosmetic problem

- [ ] Affects HR admins only
